page.title: 08AMIT'S DAY
page.content: I woke up at 9.00 a.m. on Sunday and went downstairs.Had a good stretch to get rid of all the tiredness from my body.After that I brushed my teeth and washed my face.Then we had some breakfast (an Indian dish) it was delicious apart from the hot pepper.After eating I went to clean my brother's car;that took three hours. For dinner we had chapatis,curry and salad;for pudding we went to McDonalds for a milk shake.When we came home I did some homework and then saw my older brother off who lives in a flat in London.My cousins arrived for tea and games;we played "Monopoly" and I won of course! When my cousins left I nagged my dad to buy me the game "Scrabble" and he agreed.After reading in bed I went fast asleep.
